import React from 'react' import './Sidebar.css' import { Avatar } from '@material-ui/core' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { selectUser } from './features/userSlice' function Sidebar() { // access user information const user = useSelector(selectUser); const recentItem = (topic) => (
#

) return (
{/* if user does not have an image we can render the first initial of their name */} {user?.displayName[0]}

) } export default Sidebar
